characters.name: Arkhe

moves.name: Elemental Master
moves.description: All elemental damage increased by 10%

moves.name: Airburst
moves.description: Arkhe shoots a gust of air dealing 30 air damage. Affected enemies have a 15% chance of being stunned next turn.

moves.name: Elemental Support
moves.description: Using the mastery of water and warth, provide 20 healing and 15 shield to an ally

moves.name: Monk's Rage
moves.description: Arkhe deals 100 fire damage

characters.lore: Arkhe is a monk from Valkun’s Reach, an isolated city built beneath a stable skyborne rift in a newly contacted world on the edge of the known galaxy. He is a wanderer, making his way through the alliance systems. He is known primarily as an elemental monk — someone whose body and spirit have harmonized with the leylines near the Valkun Rift.

characters.name: Avarice

moves.name: Water Priestess
moves.description: Water and Ice damage aimed at Avarice is converted into health instead

moves.name: God Blow
moves.description: Avarice deals 30 water damage

moves.name: Blessing
moves.description: Avarice heals a character for 75 HP

moves.name: Resurrection
moves.description: Avarice can bring back a character that died this turn with 25% HP

characters.lore: Avarice is a water-attuned cleric hailing from Del'Terah, a lush oceanic planet marked by vast fjords, sunken temples, and semi-submerged cities that was found during the second push era of alliance exploration. She is a devout follower of the water goddess Myriel and serves as a traveling divine channeler

characters.name: Bessil

moves.name: Enter the Nightmare
moves.description: At the start of the game, permanently reduces all enemies' accuracy by 15%

moves.name: Psionic Scream
moves.description: Deals 40 psychic damage to 1 enemy

moves.name: Abandon Hope
moves.description: Deals 30 psychic damage to 1 target. Damage increases by 10 for every debuff on the target

moves.name: KillShot
moves.description: Deals 80 psychic damage to 2 enemies. 50% chance to inflict Stun

characters.lore: Bessil is an anomaly among riftbeasts.It's origins are a mystery, and the IWO gave it a rating of Apex Class 1: the highest rating for any known current rift beasts. Bessil has psychic corruption capabilites known to sow discord among entire armies and cities

characters.name: Breach Specialist

moves.name: Insulated Lining
moves.description: All allies gain 15% fire resistance for 2 turns

moves.name: Ignition Flare
moves.description: Deals 18 fire damage to 1 enemy

moves.name: Firecracker Bombard
moves.description: Deals 10 fire damage to 2 enemies and applies 10% accuracy debuff for 1 turn

moves.name: Thermal Charge
moves.description: Deals 10 damage to all enemies and applies Burn(20 Fire DoT)for 1 turn and a 30% chance to apply Afterburn (-20% fire res) for 3 turns

characters.lore: Trained to contain small-scale rift breaches, SSC Breach Specialists wield flamethrowers to purge unstable anomalies and clear corrupted zones. Their tactics are blunt but brutally effective.

characters.name: Captain Dinso

moves.name: Vibranium Protection
moves.description: If an energy attack below 40 damage targets the Captain, there is a 50% chance for the damage to be reflected back

moves.name: Shield Bash
moves.description: The Captain slams his shield and does 20 physical damage.

moves.name: Ricochet
moves.description: The Captain skillfully throws his shield at an enemy and bounces it off them to hit a second enemy, dealing 15 physical damage each time.

moves.name: Constellian Command
moves.description: Allies receive a signature charge equal to 50% of their requirement. All debuffs on any party members are erased.

characters.lore: Dinso is a decorated officer of the Constellian Army, best known as the commanding captain of the 73rd Constellian Company (73rd CC).Born in Silgar, trained at StarSprawler Academy,transferred into the Constellian forces, he rose through the ranks not just through tactical success but for his unwavering reputation as a protector and battlefield leader.

characters.name: Constellian Trooper

moves.name: Professional Military
moves.description: Gains 10% bonus damage if 1 ally is CAF affiliated, and 25% if 2 allies are

moves.name: Rifle Shot
moves.description: Deals 20 energy damage to 1 enemy

moves.name: Scoped Rifle Shot
moves.description: Deals 35 energy damage to 1 enemy

moves.name: Carbine Overloaded
moves.description: Fires a burst at 3 enemies, dealing 22 energy damage to each

characters.lore: The backbone of the Constellian Army, Troopers are equipped with standard-issue energy rifles and serve as the primary force in the known galaxy’s largest military. Disciplined, numerous, and relentlessly deployed.

characters.name: Faru

moves.name: Rift Mutation
moves.description: All healing and damage bonus buffs given to Faru will be doubled

moves.name: Silver Sword Slash
moves.description: Faru attacks with his greatsword for 25 physical damage.

moves.name: Flaming Sword Strike
moves.description: Faru infuses his sword with fire and attacks for 45 fire damage. He has a 60% chance to inflict Burn, which deals 20 damage on the next turn.

moves.name: All Out
moves.description: Faru deals 60 physical damage. This damage is increased by 30 for every buff he currently has

characters.lore: Faru is a Rifthunter from Thalnys. Rifthunters are genetically altered warriors trained from youth to combat rift-corrupted threats. Faru is unaffiliated with any galactic faction and operates as a freelance hunter,

characters.name: Huron

moves.name: Silgar's Undying Protector
moves.description: Huron gains a 25% damage bonus for every 70 HP he regains. This effect can occur 3 times

moves.name: Scorch Ray
moves.description: Huron fires a blast dealing 50 energy damage

moves.name: Solar Cover
moves.description: Huron deals 18 energy damage to all enemies, and inflicts blinding,lowering their accuracy by 20% for the next turn

moves.name: Silgar's Might
moves.description: Huron creates a dragon of pure energy, punching through it to deal 160 energy damage

characters.lore: Huron, the Ascended Sapien of unknown origin, is Silgar’s living embodiment of martial perfection. Wielding divine strength and tactical mastery, he is the best line of defense against the galaxy’s most catastrophic enemies. No other non-divine force in known space has proven more effective at suppressing apex class rift threats

characters.name: Jack

moves.name: Crafty Crafty
moves.description: If an attack would have killed jack, it will instead reduce his hp to 1

moves.name: Blaster Rifle
moves.description: Jack shoots his rifle, dealing 20 energy damage.

moves.name: Targeted Strike
moves.description: Jack verbally abuses an enemy inflicting 'Mocked'. Mocked decreases the targets dodge by 20%

moves.name: Cindrillian Enhancements
moves.description: All allies gain a 30% damage bonus and 10 shield points

characters.lore: Jack is a rogue artificer and saboteur hailing from Cindralith, known for his deep understanding of arcano-technological systems and a long history of weaponized mischief. He often appears in CAF databases, as a person of interest linked to unsanctioned weapons theft, sabotage, or data extraction.

characters.name: KAS

moves.name: Overdrive Matrix
moves.description: When KAS drops below 50% HP for the first time, he gains 50% signature charge.

moves.name: Cinder Stream
moves.description: KAS slashes the enemy in a flurry of strikes, dealing 40 physical damage.

moves.name: Dual Wield Precision
moves.description: KAS dashes to strike two enemies with 25 physical damage each. If only one enemy remains, both hits hit them.

moves.name: Sword Skill: Eclipse
moves.description: KAS deals 100 physical damage and also reduces the targets accuracy by 10%

characters.lore: KAS (Kinematic Assault System) is a hyper-agile mechanized combat unit developed by a private military tech group in Cindralith under the banner of Halion Dynamics. Designed to serve as a single-unit strike operative, KAS combines state-of-the-art technomantic circuitry with physical design principles derived from Rift-class creature countermeasures

characters.name: Krakoa

moves.name: CA's Special Force
moves.description: Krakoa's physical and fire resistance increase by 10% for every 20% reduction in his health

moves.name: Riftbreaker Axe
moves.description: Krakoa attacks with his axe and deals 35 Ice damage.

moves.name: WarFrost
moves.description: Krakoa's axe unleashes a wall of ice, dealing 30 Ice damage. He inflicts Chill on an enemy for 2 turns, dealing 20 ice damage

moves.name: Warriors Rage
moves.description: Krakoa heals himself for 100 and becomes enraged for the next two turns. While Enraged, he only uses his normal attack and gains a 100% damage bonus multiplier

characters.lore: Krakoa is a Voidblade operative in the Constellian Navy’s elite special forces division, originally born and trained in Silgar. His combat instincts, while exceptional, were often flagged as dangerously aggressive. He was eventually recruited into the Constellian Navy's Voidblade program after catching the attention of a Vice Helm during a live simulation.

characters.name: Legionary

moves.name: Last Stand Protocol
moves.description: When HP falls below 30% for the first time, gain a 50 point shield

moves.name: Bolter Strike
moves.description: Deals 16 earth damage to 1 enemy

moves.name: Seismic Blow
moves.description: Deals 20 earth damage to 1 enemy and has a 50% chance to apply Rupture (20 earth DoT for 1 turn)

moves.name: Fortify
moves.description: Grants self Empowered (20% damage boost) for 2 turns and a 40 point shield

characters.lore: Silgar Legionaries are elite veterans of the Sprawler Corps, promoted from the rank of Warrior for their battlefield discipline and tactical skill. Armed with heavy seismic bolters, they specialize in breaking enemy lines and holding critical ground during large-scale engagements.

characters.name: Mizca

moves.name: Multiplying Rage
moves.description: At the end of each round,The Mizca gains 15% damage bonus (capped at 50%) but takes 10 true damage.

moves.name: Saber Slice
moves.description: The Mizca slices with his rift weapon, dealing 40 energy damage.

moves.name: Saber Quake
moves.description: Mizca slams the earth, dealing 20 Earth damage to 2 enemies. Has a 30% chance to inflict weakened, which reduces enemy damage by 20 percent.

moves.name: Power of the Corrupted
moves.description: Mizca rips at the very foundations of the battleground, and hurls large rocks at its enemies. Deals 55 earth damage at two enemies

characters.lore: Mizca are high-tier riftborn entities most commonly associated with Class B riftbreaks, though many A-class incidents have reported them as forward units. Standing taller than a giraffe at full extension but built with a broad, humanoid physique, Mizca embody both raw power and battlefield disruption.

characters.name: Nou

moves.name: Sky Goddess
moves.description: Nou is immune to air damage, and has a 35% chance to dodge attacks from characters

moves.name: Whirlwind
moves.description: Nou shoots a cyclone dealing 30 Air damage at two enemies

moves.name: Dust Storm
moves.description: Nou creates a dust storm. Deals 20 air damage and inflicts Covered, which reduces target's accuracy by 50% this turn

moves.name: World Wind
moves.description: Nou creates a powerful windstorm that deals 60 air damage to all enemies

characters.lore: Nou is a wind-aligned divine goddess and the central protector of Aetherion, one of the three major systems of Arkhalion’s Delta. Nou rose to prominence after the catastrophe, becoming the spiritual and magical guardian of survivors in the southern hemisphere. In the present day, she is the last god still active on Arkhalion and is considered the founder and enduring protector of Aetherion.

characters.name: Olthar

moves.name: Arbiter of Silgar
moves.description: Party members under 200 HP gain a 50% damage buff (checked at start of each round)

moves.name: Ocular Blaster
moves.description: Olthar shoots an enery blast from his eyes, dealing 35 energy damage.

moves.name: Concussive Wave
moves.description: Olthar's Hands shoot a wave of concussive force, dealing 20 air damage per enemy.

moves.name: Word of Judgement
moves.description: Olthar deals 60 energy damage and 15 energy damage to an enemy for the next two turns.

characters.lore: Olthar is the Lawbearer of Silgar and the highest judicial authority on the planet. Constructed by the IWO to counter a corrupt Silgarian High command, Olthar rose to power and is widely credited with ending Silgar’s most shameful period (The Shrouded Silgar era) and establishing the modern legal and ethical framework under which the city now operates.

characters.name: Rover

moves.name: Targeting System
moves.description: Increases allies accuracy by 20%

moves.name: Zapper
moves.description: Deals 10 lightning damage

moves.name: Confusion Tactics
moves.description: Rover's anti-radar lowers an enemy's accuracy by 15%, deals 15 physical damage

moves.name: System Hack
moves.description: Rover finds the opponents weak spots. All enemies lightning and energy resistance is reduced by 30%

characters.lore: Rover is a modified combat-support droid serving aboard Constellian Navy single-pilot interceptor vessels as a tactical adjunct and systems specialist. Originally built from a common astromech-class model, Rover has undergone extensive post-manufacture modification to meet the Navy’s high-performance standards — particularly those of the elite Riftstrike carrier fleet.

characters.name: Raish

moves.name: Sacrifice
moves.description: When an ally dies, Raish's damage is increased by 50%

moves.name: Claw
moves.description: Raish strikes dealing 20 poison damage

moves.name: Venomous Strike
moves.description: Raish bites with its corrupted mouth, dealing 30 poison damage

moves.name: Martyr
moves.description: Raish deals poison damage equal to 150% of the damage it has received

characters.lore: Raish are corrupted quadrupedal riftbeasts commonly encountered in Class C or D riftbreaks across Arkhalion and nearby systems.They are  mid-sized rift creatures known for their unpredictable aggression and volatile physiology. They move with unnatural speed and reflexes, favoring sudden, erratic charges over coordinated tactics

characters.name: Rei

moves.name: Electric Empress
moves.description: Rei is immune to lightning damage. She is also immune to Energy attacks dealing 30 damage or less

moves.name: Katana Strike
moves.description: Rei attacks with her lightning katana, dealing 40 lightning damage

moves.name: Burst Charge
moves.description: Rei deals 35 Lightning damage to an opponent and inflicts Electroshock(10 lightning DoT, -10% lightning and water res) for 2 turns

moves.name: Stunlock Spear
moves.description: Rei enhances her spear with arcana, dealing 140 lightning damage at an enemy and a has a 40% chance to inflict Stun

characters.lore: Rei is a mid-ranking operative within the Applied Arcana Division of the Intergalactic Wizarding Organization (IWO), holding the formal clearance rank of Tier IV ArcWarden. She is based on Arkhalion, where she oversees the testing and deployment of experimental magical technologies near active or unstable rift zones. She is an offensive spellcaster who specializes in lightning-based magic.

characters.name: Rellin

moves.name: Turbocharged
moves.description: Whatever lightning damage rellin takes is also added to his sig charge

moves.name: Arc Bore
moves.description: rellins modified boring arc deals 30 lightning damage

moves.name: Plasma Capacitor
moves.description: Deals 25 lightning damage and applies Static(20 Lightning DoT) for 1 turn

moves.name: Constellian Breacher
moves.description: Rellin charges with his mech, dealing 85 lightning damage and applies Shocked (-15% lightning res) for 2 turns

characters.lore: Rellin is a Line Master in the Constellian Navy, hailing from the mineral-dense world of Virellion. He leads boarding operations on compromised vessels, specializing in shock entry and power system disruption.

characters.name: Sanguine

moves.name: Blood Race
moves.description: At the start of her turn, if Sanguine has 2 or more DoT effects on her, reduce their duration by 1 and gain 25% damage bonus

moves.name: Wire Whip
moves.description: Deals 20 physical damage with a 10% chance to apply Bleed(15 Physical DoT) for 1 turn

moves.name: Incision
moves.description: Deal 25 physical damage and apply Bleed for 2 turns

moves.name: Assassin's Detonation
moves.description: Applies 60 physical damage. For every DoT on the target, the damage is increased by 20.

characters.lore: Sanguine is a Silgarian combat specialist known for her mastery of bleed-based damage. She operates as a sanctioned solo agent under direct orders from high command. She is deployed when the Silgarians want a message sent along with the kill. When fear, suffering, and spectacle are as important as the target’s elimination, Sanguine is the one for the job

characters.name: Sedra

moves.name: Tamaranean Durability
moves.description: Sedra has a 50% chance to ignore physical attacks under 30 damage.

moves.name: Heat Vision
moves.description: Sedra shoots lasers out her eyes and deals 40 Energy Damage.

moves.name: Nova Lash
moves.description: Sedra dashes in and slashes a target with solar fire, dealing 40 energy damage and applying Solar Wind (20 energy dmg over 2 turns)

moves.name: Starburst Explosion
moves.description: Sedra launches a giant explosion, dealing 50 AoE energy damage.

characters.lore: Sedra is a magically gifted young woman born in Aetherion, the daughter of two of the city’s most influential figures.She is a rising defender of Aetherion and often serves as a first response combatant for major rift activity in the region.

characters.name: Skirvex

moves.name: Parastic Birth
moves.description: The skirvex explodes upon death, unleashing rift flies that deal 20 poison damage to all enemies

moves.name: Rabid Strike
moves.description: Skirvex strikes for 10 poison damage, 20% chance to apply Venom(20 Poison DoT)

moves.name: Vapid Bite
moves.description: Skirvex bites dealing 25 poison damage. It has a 35% chance to inflict Decaying(-20% dmg) for 2 turns

moves.name: Necrosis
moves.description: Skirvex unleashes a horde of flies from its flesh sacs, which inflict Necrosis(-20% poison res) for 2 turns and expire any HoT effects on the target

characters.lore: The Skirvex is a quadrupedal riftbeast commonly encountered in Class B riftbreaks. Heavily mutated, it functions as a mobile hive for parasitic riftflies that gestate within its rotting internal cavities. The creature’s slow, unstable gait conceals its real threat: on death, the internal swarm is released, aggressively targeting nearby lifeforms

characters.name: Temple Guard

moves.name: Salvation
moves.description: All IWO or Aetherion-aligned allies gain a 30 point shield at the start of the game

moves.name: Snap Flush
moves.description: Deals 15 water damage to 1 enemy

moves.name: Aetherion Halo
moves.description: Applies Halo (increases Water, Ice, and Psychic resistances) for 2 turns to 1 ally and has a 40% chance to apply Clarity (accuracy +15%) for 1 turn

moves.name: Sonic Pump
moves.description: Deals 50 water damage to 1 enemy and applies Blinding (-20% accuracy)

characters.lore: Elite defenders of Aetherion’s sacred sites, Temple Guards are entrusted with protecting the city's ancient rituals and divine relics. Trained in both martial and magical combat, they are unwavering in their duty to uphold the will of the Council of Ascendance.

characters.name: TRex

moves.name: Apex Predator
moves.description: When T-Rex is the only surviving member of his team, gain 50% damage and full signature charge

moves.name: CHOMP
moves.description: Trex bites dealing 40 physical damage

moves.name: Rift-Hardened Hide
moves.description: Trex gains a flat 30 point shield and additionally gets 25 healing for 2 turns

moves.name: Tyrant Lizard King
moves.description: Trex bites dealing 50 physical damage and inflict Poisoned. When Poisoned, The target takes 20 poison damage for the next 2 turns

characters.lore: A towering, rift-altered predator, the Corrupted T-Rex is an apex-class threat born from the dimensional corruption of a prehistoric Earth-like species. This riftbeast falls under the category of a rift-mutated natural organism, elevated far beyond its original capabilities by exposure to high-intensity riftfields

characters.name: Trustless Engineer

moves.name: Safety Matters...ish
moves.description: All allies gain 20% poison resistance

moves.name: Acid Shot
moves.description: Deals 18 poison damage

moves.name: Venom Strike
moves.description: The engineer hurls an assortment of poison grenades, dealing 15 poison damage to all enemies

moves.name: JunkMix Bombs
moves.description: He launches a bomb at 1 enemy dealing 20 energy damage, and has a 20 chance to independently apply Burn,Poisoned,or Shock (20 fire,phys,poison) lasting 1 turn.

characters.lore: A rogue inventor operating in the outer sectors of Cindralith, this engineer has no formal affiliations and no official permits. Known only by outdated registry numbers and salvaged ID tags, he drifts from world to world selling volatile gadgets, offering quick repairs, or trading custom throwables for strange parts.

characters.name: Ulmika

moves.name: IWO's Patronage
moves.description: Ulmika removes a debuff on an ally once per round on her turn

moves.name: Wind Gust
moves.description: Ulmika deals 15 air dmg

moves.name: Arcane Blessing
moves.description: Ulmika grants a shield of 50 points to 2 allies or herself

moves.name: Flaming Ward
moves.description: Ulmika performs a warding ritual, giving 1 ally or herself 20% dodge and 40% fire resistannce for 2 turns

characters.lore: Ulmika is a Tier II Field Agent assigned to the Reconnaissance Subfield of the IWO Combat Division.She operates as part of forward-deployed detachments, often assigned to accompany Constellian military units during Class C-D riftbreaks. Her role blends recon, magical analysis, and long-range elemental support.

characters.name: Vas Drel

moves.name: Protection from Evil
moves.description: Allies take 10% less damage from riftbeast species characters

moves.name: Jet Stream
moves.description: Vas shoots a stream of compressed water for 10 damage

moves.name: Mostly Stable Runic Blessing
moves.description: Vas casts 2 runes on a party member, with a 40% chance each of applying Haste (dodge 15%) and Clarity (accuracy 15%) for 1 turn

moves.name: Fully Stable Runic Array
moves.description: Vas tunes his runic array on an ally, which applies Recover (20 HoT) for 2 turns and also reduces their skill cooldown by 2 turns

characters.lore: Vas Drel is a rune systems theorist within the IWO’s Theoretical Division, known for his obsessive field research into arcane ward systems and pre-Breakpoint sigil architecture.He carries several experimental wards designed to enhance allies' reflexes, accuracy, and healing responses

characters.name: Vemk Parlas

moves.name: Unwavering Precision
moves.description: Vemk has a 100% increase to his own accuracy

moves.name: Poisoned Chalice
moves.description: Enemy is dealt 20 poison damage

moves.name: Disruption Tactics
moves.description: Vemk applies Dazed(25% accuracy debuff) for 1 turn on 2 enemies, and deals 15 psychic damage

moves.name: Engineered Setback
moves.description: Reduces 2 enemies signature charge by 30% and deals 25 Pyschic damage

characters.lore: Vemk, a Tier 5 Veilkeeper in the Intergalactic Wizarding Organization, is one of the IWO’s most influential non-combat operatives. Officially a diplomatic liaison, Vemk operates as a silent enforcer of the IWO’s deeper agenda — ensuring that secrets stay buried, narratives remain controlled, and the organization's image never falters

characters.name: Virae

moves.name: Wrapped In Ice
moves.description: Any ice damage directed at Virae is converted into shield points for her

moves.name: Icicle Hit
moves.description: Shoots a large icicle at an opponent dealing 15 ice damage

moves.name: Frozen Aegis
moves.description: Grants a 25 shield to one ally and increases their ice resistance by 20%

moves.name: Glacial Bloom
moves.description: Increases target ally's damage by 15% and extends the duration of one existing buff by 2 turns

characters.lore: Virae is a shieldcaster from Aetherion, trained by a silent sect of monks and deeply devout to a long-fallen ice deity. Though not a frontline fighter, her presence in battle preserves her allies through cold-born barriers and quiet resilience. Her techniques emphasize protection, precision, and faith

characters.name: VyGar

moves.name: Defensive Rock
moves.description: Physical,Earth,Air and Poison Resistances for all allies increase by 10%

moves.name: Spear Strike
moves.description: VyGar attacks dealing 30 physical damage

moves.name: Meteor Strike
moves.description: VyGar fires a rock at all opponents. Each hit does 15 earth damage.

moves.name: Mighty Shield
moves.description: VyGar casts a shield on a party member. This shield has 120 shield points.

characters.lore: VyGar is a Zavrosian weapons appraiser contracted frequently by the Constellian Armed Forces and various independent trusts. He specializes in collecting weapons that have historical, political, or tactical significance. Born in the forge-cluster of Durnskarn, he rejected his clan’s traditional role as smiths and became an interpreter of weapon history instead
